label: Trýzna, Miloš & Petr Baňař.  2013. A new species of the genus Apatenia (Coleoptera: Anthribidae) from Madagascar with notes on female genitalia, redescription of the female of Apatenia quadristigma Frieser and list of Madagascan species. Zootaxa 3609(5): 504–512.
